name: Galaxy Quest (Nocrom Studios)
description:
A "episode" of my series of games all based around finding the sun, recently I have moved to the game to space and 2d. On this game you have to find your way around the map and find the sun but everything is randomized.

- By Nocrom Studios

- Oreo Osborn you know who you are
